Description.Text: The Atlantis is a fantastic and much needed addition to the Dubai Beachfront. This world class hotel is destined to be the must stay hotel in Dubai with its child friendly policy which includes dedicted kids and teenagers clubs designed for edu-tainment where they will be encouraged to learn and enjoy at the same time. There is the huge waterpark, Aquaventure, that is complimentary for in house guests as well as Dolphin Bay for a unique Dolphin Experience (at a charge). Within the hotel is the Lost Chambers which is maze of underwater halls and tunnels under the ambassador lagoon. Finally there is the Atlantis Activities Programme which provides authentic activities that cater to a wide variety of interests. Whether a mixology class for the aspiring home bartender, a drum session with a professional percussionist, a meditation or self hypnosis class, or even a magic presentation to learn simple tricks to amaze your kids, Atlantis has something for everyone. (SD 08.08)

Atlantis The Palm is the majestic focal point of the stunning and exclusive Palm Jumeirah, the man-made island that has captured the worlds ambition. The hotel itself sits at the end of the crescent and has the best location Palm Jumeirah and is located 5 1/2 kilometres off the mainland of Dubai. The journey from Dubai International Airport is approximately 45 minutes and the Mall of Emirates, Emirates Golf Club and The Media & Internet City are all close to the hotel.

Each of the spacious guest rooms are subtly designed with oceanic and arabic influences and all have spectacular views of the azure, Arabian Gulf or Palm Jumeirah. The guest rooms are located from the sixth floor of the Royal Towers. Choose from beautifully designed King or Double Queen sized beds, with full or french balconies from which to enjoy the view of Palm Jumeirah or the Arabian Gulf.
This iconic hotel is with dome shape and two main towers.

In a true resort property the Atlantis caters for all and has over 20 outlets on site, ranging from restaurants inspired by Michelin Star Chefs to all day dining restaurants. The hotel also boasts one of Dubais largest nightclubs.

An expansive but welcoming lobby, the moment you step in you feel like you are stepping into the lots city of Atlantis. Plenty of comfortable seating is strategically placed with great views over the gardens, beach and the palm.
